nodes.text: Kotal-De was a male Voss commando living on Voss during the Galactic War. Around 3640 BBY he led a squad of commandos into the Gorma-Koss on a mission to capture Jokull, the Gormak king, during which he perished.
Kotal-De appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the imperial mission "The Gormak War" on Voss.
